pr_title: Pushes Docker images solely with Travis

timeline.message:
Pushes Docker images solely with Travis

This disconnects Docker images pushes from Docker Hub completely, by
moving the logic formerly there, here.

timeline.bodyText:
I've tested this script locally, but to test travis, I need to merge first.
First, I'd wait and see if master pushed as it should.
Then, I'd re-publish 2.22.0 via docker-2.22.0
timeline.author: codefromthecrypt
timeline.diffHunk:

+# This script pushes images to GitHub Container Registry (ghcr.io). When a release, they are also
+# pushed to Docker Hub (docker.io).
+set -ue
